info.author: Donald Munro
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
pymtpfs is yet another FUSE filesystem for MTP devices.
It was motivated by the desire to have a more fault
tolerant file system for use when doing mass transfers
to and from MTP devices.
In my case specifically for transferring my ebooks to my
Nexus 7 using rsync as other solutions often tended to
hang half way through the transfer.
info.name: pymtpfs
info.summary: A FUSE based filesystem for Media Transfer Protocol (MTP) devices implemented in Python.
info.html_description: pymtpfs is yet another FUSE filesystem for MTP devices. It was motivated by the desire to have a more fault tolerant file system for use when doing mass transfers to and from MTP devices. In my case specifically for transferring my ebooks to my Nexus 7 using rsync as other solutions often tended to hang half way through the transfer.
